The Little Boring Drill

A web game made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 48
Tips:
  • Tap your drill and turn it on.
  • Tap other parts to see their contents and capabilities.
  • Build new parts.
  • Go deeper and deeper!
    (after all, that's the theme)
  • Follow @deathraygames on Twitter
  • Tap anywhere to dismiss the tips.
